basics.label: AI Research Scientist/Tech Leader/Mathematician
basics.summary: I specialize in developing theoretical grounded deep generative models that excel in producing high-fidelity samples, rapid sampling, ease of training, and controllable generation. I expect to unlock the black-box nature of deep generative modeling through the application of advanced mathematical tools. With a focus on innovation and precision, I am dedicated to pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence and contributing to the advancement of cutting-edge technology.

work.summary: Focusing on robustness, core research of deep generative models (especially diffusion models), and theoretically explainable deep learning.
